Name: SkeletalFishBoss
Notes: The skeletal shark boss fought in Bonefin Galaxy. Needs at least one SkeletalFishBossRail to be present.

Obj_arg0.Name: Phase Count
Obj_arg0.Description: The number of phases the fight will have. Defaults to 3.

Obj_arg1.Name: Guard Count
Obj_arg1.Description: The number of Guard Fish that will be spawned. Defaults to 4.

SW_A.Description: When activated, the boss battle begins.

Group.Description: Used to link to SubmarineVolcanoBigColumn and the unused SubmarineVolcanoSmallColumn. Also links with BirdLouseS and BirdLouseL.

AppearPowerStar.Description: Spawns a power star upon defeat. Requires a properly setup scenario with スカルシャーク as the PowerStarAppearObj.

NamePos.Description: Additional placements that can be freely placed.

Values.Notes: The position to place mario during the first cutscene.
The position to place mario during the other cutscenes.

DemoCast.Description: Can take part in a cutscene.

SearchTurtle.Description: Red Koopa Shells and Gold Shells home in on this object.
